summary: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Deepika Padukone|Riteish Deshmukh|Lara Dutta|Arjun Rampal|Boman Irani|Jiah Khan|Randhir Kapoor|Chunky Pandey|Lillete Dubey|Malaika Arora|Daisy Irani|Jacqueline Fernandez|Subhaan Nadiadwala|Manoj Pahwa|Suresh Menon|Vindu Dara Singh|Rajesh Verma|Peter Agnelli|Sam Braxton|Ray Burnet|Mark Johnston|Delia Antal|Cara Bamford|Tom Dab|Ginny Dee|Shawn Dixon|Sharan Hunjan|Mo Idriss|Peter Jay|Denis Khoroshko|Stephen Leddington|Mark Miller|Alex Moore|Pete Morgan|Pete Noakes|David Owen|Gemma Owen-Kendall|Aaron Palermo|Mike Parish|Gino Picciano|Baz Salam|Atul Sharma|Nick Shaw|Connor Slaney|Samuel Victor|Richard Breezy Wynn
title: Housefull
